field.value:
Here is an issue to track what was discussed here:
http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-devel/browse_frm/thread/4a5d4d0fe288790c
this brings some changes in IPaginatedPage:
PreviousIndex become PreviousPageIndex CurrentIndex become CurrentPageIndex NextPage become NextPageIndex FirstItem become FirstItemIndex LastItem become LastItemIndex HasPrevious become HasPreviousPage HasNext become HasNextPage
LastIndex, FirstIndex, HasFirst and HasLast are removed
FirstItem provides access to the first item of current page LastItem provides access to the last item of current page
TotalPages and CurrentPageSize properties where added
minor fixes in the documentation (mostly misleading zero based index which where not true)
Also added new IPaginatedPage<T> generic specialization and some test cases for the base implementations provided.
Changed other things in monorail solution to make this works
